Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.application.services

Class RecordService

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.application.services.RecordService
public class RecordService extends Object
Provides services for managing records in the financial accounting system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RecordService(RecordRepositoryInterface recordRepository)
    Constructs a RecordService with a dependency on a record repository.

  • Constructor Details

    • RecordService

      public RecordService(RecordRepositoryInterface recordRepository)
      Constructs a RecordService with a dependency on a record repository.
      Parameters:
      recordRepository - The repository to be used for data access operations.

  • Method Details

    • addRecord

      public Record addRecord(Record record)
      Adds a new record to the system.
      Parameters:
      record - The record to add.
      Returns:
      The added record.

    • deleteRecord

      public void deleteRecord(Record record)
      Deletes a record from the system.
      Parameters:
      record - The record to delete.

    • getRecord

      public Optional<Record> getRecord(Long id)
      Retrieves a record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the record to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the record if found, or an empty Optional if no record is found.

    • getAllRecords

      public Iterable<Record> getAllRecords()
      Retrieves all records stored in the system.
      Returns:
      An Iterable containing all the records.

    • createRecord

      public Record createRecord(Double amount, String description, String dateAndTime, Category category, String recordType) throws InvalidAmountException
      Creates a new record with specified details and adds it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of the record.
      description - The description of the record.
      dateAndTime - The date and time of the record.
      category - The category associated with the record.
      recordType - The type of the record (income or expense).
      Returns:
      The newly created record.
      Throws:
      InvalidAmountException - If the amount is invalid (e.g., negative).
